General.Name: Prasidha Aneka Niaga Tbk
General.Description: PT Prasidha Aneka Niaga Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and trading of agricultural products in Indonesia and internationally. It is also involved in the roasted ground and instant coffee manufacturing; coffee beans; crumb rubber processing and trading; and coffee plantation activities. PT Prasidha Aneka Niaga Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
